name: METAL
description: Knowledge can be the most powerful tool or the deadliest weapon. To survive you must balance destruction and creation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: i3 6100 or AMD FX 6300 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 or GTX 950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen5 4-core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon RX480 or GTX 1060 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
